scripts.schema:sync: cd graphql && pnpm build && cd .. && cp graphql/.pylon/schema.graphql mobile/src/libs/graphql/schema.graphql && pnpm fmt mobile/src/libs/graphql/schema.graphql && cd mobile && pnpm codegen
scripts.schema:check: pnpm schema:sync && git add mobile/src && if git diff --cached --quiet mobile/src; then echo 'Schema files are in sync.'; git reset mobile/src/libs/graphql/schema.graphql; else echo 'Schema files are out of sync. Please commit the changes after running pnpm schema:sync.'; git reset mobile/src; exit 1; fi
scripts.typecheck: cd mobile && pnpm typecheck && cd ../graphql && pnpm typecheck
